title: Steganography - Image
description:
Find hidden data within an image file.

Common techniques:
- LSB (Least Significant Bit) steganography
- Hidden data in EXIF metadata
- Data appended after image EOF
- Stegsolve color plane analysis
- Password-protected embedded files

Steps:
1. Run file, exiftool, strings
2. Check with binwalk for embedded files
3. Try stegsolve with different filters
4. Use steghide with common passwords
5. Check image properties and dimensions

Tools: steghide, stegsolve, zsteg, exiftool, binwalk
